text: Blend banana, milk, honey, and ice until smooth. Serve chilled.
title: Banana Smoothie

text: Saute onion, garlic, and ginger in oil. Add chopped potatoes, carrots, and curry powder. Cook for 5 minutes. Add peas, chopped tomatoes, and salt. Pour in coconut milk, simmer for 20 minutes. Garnish with cilantro.
title: Vegetable Curry

text: Brown chicken in oil, set aside. In the same pan, saute onion, garlic, pepper, and tomato. Add rice, paprika, saffron, salt, and mix well. Pour in broth, add chicken, simmer until rice is cooked. Add peas at the end.
title: Chicken Paella

text: Slice eggplant, salt, and let sit. Dredge in flour, dipped in beaten egg, then breadcrumbs. Fry in oil until golden. Layer in a dish with sauce, mozzarella, Parmesan, basil. Bake at 180 degrees Celsius for 30 minutes.
title: Eggplant Parmesan

text: Lay tortilla flat. Layer lettuce, sliced tomato, cucumber, and cheese. Drizzle with dressing. Roll up tightly.
title: Veggie Wrap

text: Slice tomato and mozzarella. Alternate slices on a plate, sprinkle with basil. Drizzle with oil, season with salt and pepper.
title: Caprese Salad

text: Mix cooked, diced chicken with chopped lettuce, tomato, and cucumber. Add dressing, salt, and pepper. Toss well.
title: Chicken Salad

text: Saute mushrooms, onion, and garlic in oil and butter. Set mushrooms aside, add rice to pan, toast for 2 minutes. Add wine, cook until absorbed. Gradually add broth, stirring constantly. Stir in mushrooms, Parmesan, thyme, salt, and pepper.
title: Mushroom Risotto

text: Saute onion and garlic in oil. Add paste and thyme. Lay slices of eggplant, zucchini, bell pepper, and tomato in a circular pattern over the sauce. Drizzle with oil, season. Cover and simmer for 40 minutes.
title: Ratatouille

text: Make dough with flour, butter, salt. Chill, then press into a pie dish. Saute onion, garlic, spinach. In a bowl, beat eggs, cream, cheese, salt, pepper. Add spinach mix, pour into crust. Bake at 180 degrees Celsius for 35 minutes.
title: Spinach Quiche

text: Add the flour into a bowl, then add the milk and yeast and stir it around until thick. Add the eggs and stir it around once again, then add the salt and sugar. Bake them in the oven for 25 minutes at 180 degrees Celsius
title: Bread

text: Season cod with paprika, cumin, salt, and pepper. Grill until cooked. Mix cabbage, cilantro, lime juice, and salt for slaw. Blend avocado with lime juice for guacamole. Assemble tacos with fish, slaw, guacamole, and yogurt on tortillas.
title: Fish Tacos

text: Toast bread slices. Mix chopped tomato, minced garlic, basil, salt, pepper, and oil. Top bread with tomato mixture.
title: Tomato Bruschetta

text: Cook pasta. Saute minced garlic in oil. Toss cooked pasta with garlic oil, season with salt and pepper. Garnish with grated cheese and chopped parsley.
title: Garlic Pasta

text: In a large bowl, cream together the butter and sugar until smooth. Beat in the egg and vanilla. Combine the flour, and salt; stir into the creamed mixture. Mix in the chocolate chips. Drop by large spoonfuls onto ungreased baking sheets. Bake for 10 minutes in the oven preheated to 175 degrees Celsius, or until edges are nicely browned.
title: Chocolate Chip Cookies

text: Slice cucumbers thinly. Mix vinegar, sugar, and salt. Pour over cucumbers and chill.
title: Cucumber Salad

text: Cook ground beef with cumin, chili, salt, and pepper. Saute onions until translucent. Assemble tacos with beef, lettuce, chopped tomato, grated cheese, sour cream, and sauteed onions in tortillas.
title: Beef Tacos

text: Blend berries, banana, yogurt, honey, milk, and ice until smooth. Adjust sweetness with honey, and consistency with milk or ice. Serve chilled for a refreshing and healthy drink.
title: Berry Smoothie

text: Toast bread. Mash avocado with lemon juice, salt, and pepper. Spread on toast.
title: Avocado Toast

text: Press tofu, cut into cubes. Mix soy, water, cornstarch, sugar, vinegar for sauce. Stir-fry garlic, ginger, vegetables in oil. Add tofu, sauce, cook until sauce thickens. Serve with rice or noodles.
title: Tofu Stir-Fry

text: Blend soaked chickpeas, onion, garlic, parsley, cumin, coriander, salt, and pepper until coarse. Add flour, mix well. Form into balls, deep fry in oil until golden brown. Serve with tahini sauce.
title: Falafel

text: Saute onion and garlic in oil. Add pumpkin, cook for 10 minutes. Pour in stock, simmer until pumpkin is soft. Blend until smooth. Return to heat, add cream, thyme, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes.
title: Pumpkin Soup

text: Saute onion, garlic, carrot, and celery in oil. Add lentils, chopped tomato, cumin, coriander, salt, and pepper. Pour in broth, bring to a boil, then simmer until lentils are tender.
title: Lentil Soup

text: Layer yogurt, granola, and berries in a glass. Drizzle with honey. Repeat layers until glass is full.
title: Fruit Parfait

text: Blend anchovies, garlic, yolk, lemon juice, mustard, and oil for the dressing. Season with salt and pepper. Toss lettuce with croutons, dressing, and shaved Parmesan cheese.
title: Caesar Salad

text: Beat eggs with salt and pepper. Cook mushrooms in butter. Pour eggs over mushrooms, add cheese. Fold omelette and serve.
title: Mushroom Omelette

text: Saute onion, garlic, and carrot in oil. Add chopped tomatoes, cook for 10 minutes. Pour in broth, simmer for 20 minutes. Blend until smooth. Return to heat, add cream, basil, salt, and pepper. Simmer for 5 minutes.
title: Tomato Soup

text: Spread peanut butter on bread slices. Add banana slices. Close sandwich and serve.
title: Peanut Butter Banana Sandwich

text: Make dough with flour, butter, sugar, and salt. Chill for 1 hour. Peel and slice apples, mix with sugar, cinnamon, nutmeg, and lemon juice. Roll out dough, fill with apple mixture. Cover with top crust, brush
title: Apple Pie
